text: Hi All, I have complete CMS for Developers 1 & 2 both in the last year or so. What I cant understand is that CMS for developers 1 has an expiry date whereas CMS for developers 2 has an open ended certificate. Is there a way to change my CMS for Developers 1 cert in to a open ended cert? Don't think i can face making that cat website again.
Hi Daniele, please check out this free Academy course on HubSpot's free tools: <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/HubSpot-free-tools>
To recertify you just need to retake the exams. You do not need to resubmit the practical exercise.
